name: That Which Binds Us (IGMC)
description:
Note: this is the game jam version for IGMC! If you'd like to play the updated demo for the extended full version, please download it from here!

Idris is a bonds man- a special bonds man. While most of his clients need to bail loved ones out of jail, a few are looking for a reprieve from someone they once knew. For Evalise, all she wanted was to get a bail bond for her boyfriend, when Idris surprised her with a simple but confusing question.
What if you could make him forget all about you?

This game is still a work in progress, and is being made for the Indie Game Maker Contest 2017! I hope you guys like the finished version!

Credits:

Art, Concept, Development, and Story: Me, Mikomi Kisomi

Plugins: TDD and yanfly

A special thank you to all my friends who helped proofread my script and helped me decide on a title!
